ygData.subject: Re: Agreed
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe you need to be level 30 or higher to go to the Frontier Mountains and kill giants. And yes, they can be kited, I have seen druids do it in the past,
ygData.messageBody:
I believe you need to be level 30 or higher to go to the Frontier Mountains
and kill giants. And yes, they can be kited, I have seen druids do it in the
past, but they were horrible experience for me... the money was worth it
though.

-= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
-= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
-= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
